revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section 13(a) of the
Exchange Act. ☐

Item 5.07 Submission of Matters to a Vote of Security Holders.

(a) Registrant held its Annual Meeting of Shareholders on Tuesday, May 18, 2021;
2,592,392,087 shares were represented in person or by proxy, or 85.49% of the
total shares outstanding.

(b) The results of the shareholder voting on the proposals presented were as
follows:
                                                                                  
  MANAGEMENT PROPOSALS                                                            
                                                                                  
Proposal 1 - Shareholders elected the 10 director nominees named in the Proxy
Statement. All director nominees received at least 91.60% of the votes cast.
